titles.title: A bill to provide limits on the reduction of Internal Revenue Service user fees.
A bill to provide limits on the reduction of Internal Revenue Service user fees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill provides for a limit, through 2025, on the reduction of Internal Revenue Service user fees (e.g., fees for requests for ruling letters, opinion letters, and determination letters). Any reduced fee may not exceed 5% of the lowest fee charged for a taxpayer whose gross income is $5 million or more in a taxable year.
